sentence.Network_en: The pain destroyed their soul and froze their mind in insentient panic.
sentence.Network_cn: 痛苦毁灭了他们的灵魂，把他们的思维冰冻在无知觉的恐惧之中。

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... insensate 无感觉的；蠢笨的 insentient 无知觉的，无生命的 insert 插入.

means.word_mean: 1. devoid of feeling and consciousness and animation;

auth_sentence.content: So they are not completely insentient about these sorts of human rights questions, but their record remains awful.
